backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining SurgeryCase, Task, and UserProfile types with CRUD operations for veterinary surgery cases, user profiles, and OpenAI configuration; includes authorization mixin with admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend React components, hooks, and utilities covering authentication, case management with task tracking, CSV import/export, search/filter functionality, and form validation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for UI elements (background, foreground, primary, secondary, borders, charts, sidebar).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for SurgiPaw PWA with favicon links, manifest reference, Apple touch icon configuration, and viewport/theme-color meta tags.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining SurgiPaw app metadata, standalone display mode, theme colors, and icon references for 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, precaching app shell on install, cleaning old caches on activate, and skipping Internet Identity/API/extension requests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing authentication state, view routing (dashboard/cases/settings), profile setup modal, admin-only settings access, case navigation with highlighting, and forced light theme enforcement.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: React context providing username/password authentication with mock implementation, session management via localStorage (remember me) or sessionStorage, and login/register/logout methods.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Main authentication view component that toggles between login and registration forms, includes header with logo and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login form component with username/password inputs, remember-me checkbox, validation, and loading states that calls the auth context login method.
Logout button component that displays username and triggers logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog for initial profile setup that prompts users to enter their name after registration.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Re: Registration form component with username, password, and confirm password fields that validates inputs and calls the auth context register method.
frontend/src/features/auth/validation.ts: Validation utilities for username (3-30 chars), password (min 8 chars), and password matching with typed validation results.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist items (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) with configuration, default selections, and utility functions for calculating task completion and styling.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Surgery case card component displaying patient info, editable notes, task checklist with completion tracking, and delete functionality with confirmation dialog.

Dialog component for creating and editing surgery cases with form fields for patient/owner details, AI-powered structured text parsing, checklist task selection, and auto-prefill from matched medical record numbers.
Main list view component that displays filtered and sorted surgery cases with search, species/task filters, CSV import/export, and handles case selection with scroll-to and highlight animations.
Search input component with clear button for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select control for choosing case sorting options (e.g., arrival date, pet name).
Popover filter component with checkboxes for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, etc.) with session storage persistence.
Popover filter component for filtering cases by incomplete task types and toggling visibility of completed cases, with session storage persistence.
Reusable checklist component that supports both creation mode (selecting which tasks to track) and completion mode (marking tasks as done) with color-coded task items.
React component providing CSV import/export UI for surgery cases with progress tracking, error display, and batch create/update operations using mutations.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: Custom date input component with calendar picker that auto-formats MM/DD/YYYY input, validates dates, and supports auto-advance to next field on completion.
Core CSV import/export logic that parses CSV files into surgery case data, validates fields, handles existing case updates, and generates downloadable CSV exports.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for surgery cases including headers, field descriptions, validation constants for species/sex/boolean values, and date format regex.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides filtering functions for surgery cases by species, task types, task completion status, and whether all selected tasks are completed.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors (O/0, I/1/l), and removing artifacts as fallback for AI analysis.
Parses semi-structured text with label:value pairs into CaseFormData fields, handling species, sex, dates, and string fields with regex pattern matching as AI/Quick Fill fallback.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases using a hidden iframe and browser's native print functionality. Creates an HTML table with case details and remaining tasks, styled for landscape printing.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of surgery cases with remaining tasks. Handles CSV field escaping and creates a timestamped filename for download.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utilities for PDF display: converts Time (bigint nanoseconds) to MM/DD/YYYY strings, formats Species and Sex enums to readable text, and handles task list formatting.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utilities for CSV reports: converts Time to date strings, and formats Species and Sex enums to readable text for CSV export.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Implements case search functionality that filters surgery cases by matching query against basic fields (MRN, pet name, owner, species, etc.) and remaining checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file, likely a placeholder for future AI image analysis service implementation.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Provides sorting functionality for surgery cases with four options: arrival date (newest/oldest) and open tasks count (most/fewest).
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types and constants for case forms, including Species and Sex option arrays and the CaseFormData interface.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation and parsing functions for case form fields including MRN, pet name, owner name, breed, species, sex, dates, and booleans with flexible string matching.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard component that displays surgery cases with filtering, searching, sorting, and PDF export capabilities. Shows case cards with task badges and provides navigation to individual cases.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open tasks from surgery cases and calculate total open task counts across multiple cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: React component for managing application settings, specifically OpenAI API key configuration with validation status display, secure input field with show/hide toggle, and save functionality using custom hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom React hook that debounces a changing value with a configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on surgery cases, user profiles, tasks, and OpenAI configuration, using the actor hook to interact with the backend canister.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a light blue color scheme for the application, including specialized colors for patient names, species fields, presenting complaints, and notes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to merge CSS class names with proper Tailwind class precedence.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf-autotable module types.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf module types.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for tesseract.js OCR library, including Worker interface, recognition options, result structures with text blocks/lines/words, and PSM/OEM enums.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended font families, border radius variables, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting an authentication app with known AuthProvider context wrapping issues in production builds and pending architectural fixes.
